problem_names:
lemma rewrite_B2_to_cases[simp]:
  shows "B2 s t f = (case s of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some s1) \<Rightarrow> (case t of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some t1) \<Rightarrow> f s1 t1))"

lemma rewrite_B_m_True[simp]:
  shows "m \<rightharpoonup> (\<lambda> a . True) = True"

lemma rewrite_B2_cases:
  shows "(case a of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some s) \<Rightarrow> (case b of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some t) \<Rightarrow> f s t))
          = (\<forall> s t . a = (Some s) \<and> b = (Some t) \<longrightarrow> f s t)"
translations:
lemma rewrite_B2_to_cases[simp]:
  shows "B2 s t f = (case s of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some s1) \<Rightarrow> (case t of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some t1) \<Rightarrow> f s1 t1))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. B2 s t f =
    (case s of None \<Rightarrow> True
     | Some s1 \<Rightarrow>
         case t of None \<Rightarrow> True | Some t1 \<Rightarrow> f s1 t1)
unfolding B2_def B_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case s of None \<Rightarrow> True
     | Some a \<Rightarrow>
         case t of None \<Rightarrow> True | Some x \<Rightarrow> f a x) =
    (case s of None \<Rightarrow> True
     | Some s1 \<Rightarrow>
         case t of None \<Rightarrow> True | Some t1 \<Rightarrow> f s1 t1)
by(cases s,cases t,simp+)

lemma rewrite_B_None[simp]:
  shows "None \<rightharpoonup> \<alpha> = True"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. None \<rightharpoonup> \<alpha> = True
unfolding B_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case None of None \<Rightarrow> True
     | Some a \<Rightarrow> \<alpha> a) =
    True
by(auto)

lemma rewrite_B_m_True[simp]:
  shows "m \<rightharpoonup> (\<lambda> a . True) = True"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m \<rightharpoonup> (\<lambda>a. True) = True
unfolding B_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case m of None \<Rightarrow> True | _ \<Rightarrow> True) = True
by(cases m,simp+)

lemma rewrite_B2_cases:
  shows "(case a of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some s) \<Rightarrow> (case b of None \<Rightarrow> True | (Some t) \<Rightarrow> f s t))
          = (\<forall> s t . a = (Some s) \<and> b = (Some t) \<longrightarrow> f s t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case a of None \<Rightarrow> True
     | Some s \<Rightarrow>
         case b of None \<Rightarrow> True | Some t \<Rightarrow> f s t) =
    (\<forall>s t. a = Some s \<and> b = Some t \<longrightarrow> f s t)
by(cases a,simp,cases b,simp+)

definition strict_equal :: "'a option \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool"
where "strict_equal m a \<equiv> case m of None \<Rightarrow> False | (Some a') \<Rightarrow> a' = a"
end
